content.description: Source: Centre for the Study of Public Policy, RusssiaVotes.org, 2016
content.question: Which of the following best describes the trend in the data in the table?

choices.label: There was a change from a single-party dictatorship to a multiparty democracy between 1993 and 2016.
There was a decline in the number of parties in the Russian parliament between 1993 and 2016 and a shift to a dominant party.
There was a shift from a more regionally diverse parliament to a more ideologically polarized legislature.
There was a gradual increase in the number of democratic parties in Russia that were opposed to communism.

content.answer: There was a decline in the number of parties in the Russian parliament between 1993 and 2016 and a shift to a dominant party.

unit.text: 4: Party and Electoral Systems and Citizen Organizations

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Describe patterns and trends in data.
